title: Was the police officer holding Ryoter's hand in the U.S. Capitol Building?
subtitle: A video of a law enforcement officer accompanying a woman down the stairs during riots in the American Capitol painted comparisons for the treatment of protesters Black Lives Mater.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A video of a law enforcement officer holding a woman's hand and escorting her down the stairs during a pro-Trap riot in the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021.
